title: La Despensa Verde
typeOfFood: Ovo, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Peruvian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All food served is vegetarian, but they offer fish as an option. Has many vegan choices like different kinds of pasta dishes and quinoa. Vegetable milk is available for both cocoa and coffee. Nice atmosphere. Friendly staff that cooks the food when it is ordered, so it takes a bit more time.
